title: Season 3 Assassin
desc:
Post 51
***Prep Work** (x2, Charge 120%)*
Target a player during the Evening, before results, and choose either a response or a role. If the targeted player wrote that response or has that role, they will permanently be considered "prepped" by you. Just kidding, they will be considered "prepped" by you either way.
***Paranoia** (x1, Charge 100%)*
If you are visited tonight, you will attack one of your visitors and roleblock them. This ability can't be roleblocked.
***Assassinate** (Passive)*
If you attack a player who is prepped, you will deal 10.0x Attack Power to them.
